` *---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Report Multi Thread Tutorial *---------------------------------------------------------------------* ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustaz Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008-2010 **********************************************************************
REPORT ygpl_mt_tutorial_launch.
TYPE-POOLS: abap.
SELECTION-SCREEN BEGIN OF BLOCK mode WITH FRAME TITLE text-trm. PARAMETERS : p_gen TYPE abap_bool RADIOBUTTON GROUP mode, p_sub TYPE abap_bool RADIOBUTTON GROUP mode, p_spe TYPE abap_bool RADIOBUTTON GROUP mode. SELECTION-SCREEN END OF BLOCK mode.
PARAMETERS : * clr_all TYPE oax AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT ' ', thread TYPE ygpl_mt_my_run=>td_count DEFAULT 2 OBLIGATORY, bloc_s TYPE ygpl_mt_my_run=>td_count DEFAULT 10 OBLIGATORY, * wait_m TYPE YGPL_MT_MY_RUN=>TD_WAITTIME DEFAULT 30, * prog_m TYPE YGPL_MT_MY_RUN=>TD_COUNT DEFAULT 1, mem_size TYPE ygpl_mt_my_run=>td_memory_size DEFAULT 0.
SELECTION-SCREEN BEGIN OF BLOCK load WITH FRAME TITLE text-tlp. PARAMETERS : wait_t TYPE ygpl_mt_my_run=>td_waittime DEFAULT 3, obj_c TYPE i DEFAULT 5 OBLIGATORY. SELECTION-SCREEN END OF BLOCK load.
TYPES: BEGIN OF ts_ctrl, msg TYPE t100a-arbgb, msg_ctrl TYPE string, END OF ts_ctrl, tt_ctrl TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ts_ctrl.
DATA my_run TYPE REF TO ygpl_mt_my_run. DATA it_objects TYPE ygpl_mt_my_run=>tt_data. DATA it_dep TYPE ygpl_mt_my_run=>tt_dependencies. * is_finished TYPE oax, * _jobname TYPE tbtcjob-jobname, * _jobcount TYPE tbtcjob-jobcount, * 1st_c TYPE c, * line TYPE i, * c_line TYPE i, * w_dep LIKE LINE OF it_dep, * int TYPE i, * s_progress TYPE ygpl_mt_my_run=>ts_progression, * w_obj LIKE LINE OF it_objects, * w_lang LIKE LINE OF w_obj-lang.
START-OF-SELECTION. DATA s_param TYPE ygpl_mt_my_run=>ts_my_run_parameters. * IF NOT clr_all IS INITIAL. * CALL METHOD YGPL_MT_MY_RUN=>delete_all. * ENDIF.
CREATE OBJECT my_run EXPORTING thread_count = thread max_memory = mem_size bloc_size = bloc_s.
s_param-memory_size = mem_size. s_param-wait_time = wait_t. s_param-obj_count = obj_c. my_run->set_parameters( s_param ).
PERFORM create_worklist.
* Prepare MT CALL METHOD my_run->add_objects EXPORTING OBJECTS = it_objects dependencies = it_dep.
* Before starting Clear Controle table DELETE FROM ygpl_t100t. COMMIT WORK AND WAIT.
CASE abap_true. WHEN p_gen. my_run->set_task_classname( 'YGPL_MT_MY_TASK' ). my_run->start_threads( ) . WHEN p_sub. my_run->start_threads( ) . WHEN p_spe. PERFORM launch_theards_manually. WHEN OTHERS. ASSERT 0 = 1. ENDCASE.
* Watching Threads. my_run->wait_progress( ).
END-OF-SELECTION.
PERFORM display_progress.
PERFORM check_insertion.
*---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Form LAUNCH_THEARDS_MANUALLY *---------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM launch_theards_manually . DATA _jobname TYPE tbtcjob-jobname. DATA _jobcount TYPE tbtcjob-jobcount.
CLEAR bloc_s. DO thread TIMES. ADD 1 TO bloc_s. _jobname = bloc_s. CONDENSE _jobname. CONCATENATE sy-cprog ' MT N°'(i01) _jobname INTO _jobname. CALL FUNCTION 'JOB_OPEN' EXPORTING * DELANFREP = ' ' * JOBGROUP = ' ' jobname = _jobname * SDLSTRTDT = NO_DATE * SDLSTRTTM = NO_TIME * JOBCLASS = IMPORTING jobcount = _jobcount * CHANGING * RET = EXCEPTIONS cant_create_job = 1 invalid_job_data = 2 jobname_missing = 3 OTHERS = 4. IF sy-subrc <> 0. MESSAGE e069(/bdl/d-) WITH 'JOB_OPEN'(e02). ENDIF.
CALL METHOD my_run->add_thread EXPORTING jobname = _jobname jobid = _jobcount.
SUBMIT ygpl_mt_tutorial WITH run_id = my_run->process_id WITH wait_t = wait_t WITH obj_c = obj_c WITH mem_size = mem_size VIA JOB _jobname NUMBER _jobcount AND RETURN. IF sy-subrc <> 0. MESSAGE e069(/bdl/d-) WITH 'SUBMIT'(e03). ENDIF.
CALL FUNCTION 'JOB_CLOSE' EXPORTING * AT_OPMODE = ' ' * AT_OPMODE_PERIODIC = ' ' * CALENDAR_ID = ' ' * EVENT_ID = ' ' * EVENT_PARAM = ' ' * EVENT_PERIODIC = ' ' jobcount = _jobcount jobname = _jobname * LASTSTRTDT = NO_DATE * LASTSTRTTM = NO_TIME * PRDDAYS = 0 * PRDHOURS = 0 * PRDMINS = 0 * PRDMONTHS = 0 * PRDWEEKS = 0 * PREDJOB_CHECKSTAT = ' ' * PRED_JOBCOUNT = ' ' * PRED_JOBNAME = ' ' * SDLSTRTDT = NO_DATE * SDLSTRTTM = NO_TIME * STARTDATE_RESTRICTION = BTC_PROCESS_ALWAYS strtimmed = abap_false * TARGETSYSTEM = ' ' * START_ON_WORKDAY_NOT_BEFORE = SY-DATUM * START_ON_WORKDAY_NR = 0 * WORKDAY_COUNT_DIRECTION = 0 * RECIPIENT_OBJ = * TARGETSERVER = ' ' dont_release = abap_true * TARGETGROUP = ' ' * DIRECT_START = * IMPORTING * JOB_WAS_RELEASED = * CHANGING * RET = EXCEPTIONS cant_start_immediate = 1 invalid_startdate = 2 jobname_missing = 3 job_close_failed = 4 job_nosteps = 5 job_notex = 6 lock_failed = 7 invalid_target = 8 OTHERS = 9. IF sy-subrc > 1. MESSAGE e069(/bdl/d-) WITH 'JOB_CLOSE'(e04). ENDIF.
ENDDO.
ENDFORM. " LAUNCH_THEARDS_MANUALLY *---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Form CREATE_WORKLIST *---------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM create_worklist . TYPES: BEGIN OF ts_data, msg TYPE t100a-arbgb, langu TYPE t100t-sprsl, text TYPE string, END OF ts_data . TYPES: tt_data TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ts_data WITH NON-UNIQUE KEY msg . DATA it_data TYPE tt_data. DATA c_line TYPE i. DATA w_obj LIKE LINE OF it_objects. DATA 1st_c TYPE c. DATA line TYPE i. DATA w_lang LIKE LINE OF w_obj-lang. DATA int TYPE i. DATA w_dep LIKE LINE OF it_dep.
FIELD-SYMBOLS: <wa> LIKE LINE OF it_data.
* GET worklist SELECT t~arbgb l~sprsl l~stext INTO TABLE it_data FROM t100a AS t LEFT JOIN t100t AS l ON l~arbgb = t~arbgb * where arbgb < 'D' .
SORT it_data BY msg langu. LOOP AT it_data ASSIGNING <wa>. AT NEW msg. ADD 1 TO c_line. CLEAR w_obj. w_obj-msg = <wa>-msg. IF 1st_c <> w_obj-msg(1). 1st_c = w_obj-msg(1). line = c_line. ENDIF. IF 1st_c > 'A'. CLEAR 1st_c. ENDIF. ENDAT.
w_lang-langu = <wa>-langu. w_lang-text = <wa>-text. int = STRLEN( w_lang-text ). ADD int TO w_obj-weight. APPEND w_lang TO w_obj-lang.
AT END OF msg. APPEND w_obj TO it_objects. IF line <> c_line AND NOT 1st_c IS INITIAL. w_dep-obj1 = line. w_dep-obj2 = c_line. INSERT w_dep INTO TABLE it_dep. ELSEIF 1st_c CO '123456789'. " regouper 0 à 9 ensemble w_dep-obj1 = line - 1. w_dep-obj2 = c_line. INSERT w_dep INTO TABLE it_dep. ENDIF. ENDAT. ENDLOOP. ENDFORM. " CREATE_WORKLIST *---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Form DISPLAY_PROGRESS *---------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM display_progress . DATA s_progress TYPE ygpl_mt_my_run=>ts_progression. FIELD-SYMBOLS <st> LIKE LINE OF s_progress-global_status.
s_progress = my_run->get_progression( ). LOOP AT s_progress-global_status ASSIGNING <st>. WRITE:/ <st>-status, <st>-count. ENDLOOP. ENDFORM. " DISPLAY_PROGRESS *---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Form CHECK_INSERTION *---------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM check_insertion . DATA it_ctrl TYPE tt_ctrl. FIELD-SYMBOLS <msg> LIKE LINE OF it_ctrl.
* Clear Controle table SELECT t~arbgb c~arbgb INTO TABLE it_ctrl FROM t100a AS t LEFT JOIN ygpl_t100t AS c ON c~arbgb = t~arbgb.
DELETE it_ctrl WHERE NOT msg_ctrl IS INITIAL. IF NOT it_ctrl IS INITIAL. DESCRIBE TABLE it_ctrl LINES obj_c. WRITE:/ 'list of missing objects'(i03), obj_c. LOOP AT it_ctrl ASSIGNING <msg>. WRITE:/ <msg>-msg. ENDLOOP. ENDIF.
ENDFORM. " CHECK_INSERTION
